title: Cannot open the launcher
body:
when i try to open the lol launcher, a pop-up shows saying: 
"PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working

A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available."

does anybody know if there is anything i can do to fix this?

replies.body: Your patcher needs to permission to launch and scan files, otherwise you may see this message.  Going over the steps in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide can help get this fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions!
